quotes: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Get busy living or get busy dying.
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.
I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
Everybody has a plan until they get punched in the mouth.
Discipline is doing what you hate to do but nonetheless doing it like you love it.
Sometimes you gotta run before you can walk.
It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
Just because someone stumbles and loses their path, doesn't mean they're lost forever
Let he who is without sin cast the first stone.
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us
English Motherf*****, do you speak it!?
In their last moment, People show you who they're really are
What is real? How do you define 'real'? If you're talking about what you can feel, what you can smell, what you can taste and see, then 'real' is simply electrical signals interpreted by your brain.
You may lose your faith in us, but never in yourselves.
In time, they will join you in the sun. In time, you will help them accomplish wonders.
People need dramatic examples to shake them out of apathy and I can't do that as Bruce Wayne.
There's a difference between knowing the path and walking the path.
Sometimes, the truth isn't good enough. Sometimes people deserve more.
I don’t have dreams, I have goals.
Win a no-win situation by rewriting the rules.
I don’t play the odds. I play the man.
Life is this. I like this.
There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.
The mind is a wonderful thing. It can create, it can destroy.
The truth is not always the same as the majority opinion.
To be a great liar, you must be a great observer.
Sometimes the best way to solve a problem is to ignore it.
The world is full of mysteries. Solving them is what makes life interesting.
Every time you get angry, you lose a little bit of your power.
